subNode:value.scalar:string: Adds a block displaying current product specials.
Show the block even if no product is available.
Specials are displayed randomly on the front end, but since it takes a lot of ressources, it is better to cache the results. Cache is reset everyday. 0 will disable the cache.

scalar:array.comment: // We need to create multiple caches because the products are sorted randomly
// We need to create multiple caches because the products are sorted randomly
